title: Super Mario Bros.
description: A classic platformer game featuring Mario and Luigi.

title: The Legend of Zelda
description: An action-adventure game that follows the hero Link.

title: Minecraft
description: A sandbox game that allows players to build and explore virtual worlds.

title: Call of Duty
description: A first-person shooter game set in various historical and modern warfare scenarios.

title: Fortnite
description: A battle royale game that features building mechanics and colorful graphics.

title: Overwatch
description: A team-based multiplayer first-person shooter with a diverse cast of characters.

title: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
description: An open-world RPG set in a fantasy universe filled with dragons and magic.

title: Grand Theft Auto V
description: An action-adventure game that allows players to explore a fictional city and engage in various criminal activities.

title: Pokemon Red/Blue
description: The original Pokemon games where players capture and train creatures called Pokemon.

title: Tetris
description: A tile-matching puzzle game that has become a cultural phenomenon.

title: Sonic the Hedgehog
description: A fast-paced platformer game featuring the blue hedgehog, Sonic.

title: Halo: Combat Evolved
description: A sci-fi first-person shooter that follows the story of Master Chief.

title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: An open-world RPG that follows the adventures of Geralt of Rivia.

title: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: An action-adventure game set in the American Wild West.

title: Street Fighter II
description: A classic fighting game that features iconic characters and special moves.
